00018 class SurfaceFormat
00019 {
00020 public:
00024     enum SurfaceFormatType
00025     {
00027         SURFACE_UNKNOWN,
00029         SURFACE_R8G8B8,
00031         SURFACE_B8G8R8,
00033         SURFACE_A8R8G8B8,
00035         SURFACE_X8R8G8B8,
00037         SURFACE_X8B8G8R8,
00039         SURFACE_A8B8G8R8,
00041         SURFACE_R5G6B5,
00043         SURFACE_R5G5B5,
00045         SURFACE_R6G6B6,
00047         SURFACE_P4,
00049         SURFACE_P8,
00051         SURFACE_L8,
00053         SURFACE_A1R5G5B5,
00055         SURFACE_X4R4G4B4,
00057         SURFACE_A4R4G4B4,
00059         SURFACE_A4B4G4R4,
00061         SURFACE_R4G4B4A4,
00063         SURFACE_A1B5G5R5,
00065         SURFACE_R5G5B5A1,
00067         SURFACE_R3G3B2,
00069         SURFACE_R3G2B3,
00071         SURFACE_A8,
00073         SURFACE_A8R3G3B2,
00075         SURFACE_A8R3G2B3,
00077         SURFACE_DXT1,
00079         SURFACE_DXT3,
00081         SURFACE_DXT5,
00083         SURFACE_R16F,
00085         SURFACE_G16R16F,
00087         SURFACE_A16B16G16R16F,
00089         SURFACE_R32F,
00091         SURFACE_G32R32F,
00093         SURFACE_A32B32G32R32F,
00095         SURFACE_D32,
00097         SURFACE_D24,
00099         SURFACE_D16,
00101         SURFACE_D24S8,
00103         SURFACE_LAST,
00104     };
00105 
00109     SurfaceFormat();
00110 
00116     explicit SurfaceFormat( const char* desc );
00117 
00121     SurfaceFormat( SurfaceFormatType type );
00122 
00127     SurfaceFormat( int bitCount, uint32_t redMask, uint32_t greenMask, uint32_t blueMask, uint32_t alphaMask );
00128 
00132     SurfaceFormatType   type() const;
00133 
00138     int         bitsPerPixel() const;
00139 
00143     bool        hasAlpha() const;
00144 
00150     uint32_t    getChannelMask( int i ) const;
00151 
00157     int         getChannelBitCount( int i ) const;
00158 
00163     int         paletteEntries() const;
00164 
00168     bool        operator==( const SurfaceFormat& other ) const          {return m_type==other.m_type;}
00169 
00173     bool        operator!=( const SurfaceFormat& other ) const          {return m_type!=other.m_type;}
00174 
00178     bool        compressed() const      {return m_type >= SURFACE_DXT1 && m_type <= SURFACE_DXT5;}
00179 
00183     bool        hdr() const             {return m_type >= SURFACE_R16F && m_type <= SURFACE_A32B32G32R32F;}
00184 
00188     bool        palettized() const      {return m_type == SURFACE_P8 || m_type == SURFACE_P4;}
00189 
00200     void        copyPixels( void* dst, const SurfaceFormat& dstpalfmt, const void* dstpal,
00201                     const SurfaceFormat& srcfmt, const void* src, const SurfaceFormat& srcpalfmt, const void* srcpal, 
00202                     int pixels ) const;
00203 
00208     void        copyPixels( void* dst, int dstpitch, const SurfaceFormat& dstpalfmt, const void* dstpal,
00209                     const SurfaceFormat& srcfmt, const void* src, int srcpitch, const SurfaceFormat& srcpalfmt, const void* srcpal,
00210                     int width, int height ) const;
00211 
00217     void        getPixel( int x, int y,
00218                         const void* data, int pitch, 
00219                         const SurfaceFormat& palfmt, const void* pal,
00220                         float* rgba ) const;
00221 
00223     int         getMemoryUsage( int w, int h ) const;
00224 
00226     const char* toString() const;
00227 
00228 private:
00229     SurfaceFormatType m_type;
00230 };
